column4: Hi all. Running on Ubuntu as we speak. Have a quick question about accessing my files on my windows partitions. I have all my mp3s stored in ntfs =/.
do you need to write to the NTFS system aswell or is readonly enough. Are the NTFS partiotion on a separate computer/harddrive or are you dualbooting ?
For the time being, I just need to read.
No commands. I'm trying to access it via gui.
